5: String Manipulation¶

Description¶

Various manipulation functions for strings.

Arguments¶

Internal¶

  • Function to Perform: The function type. Set to 1 to get length, 2 to set length, 3 to get a substring, and 4 to set a substring.

External¶

1: Get Length¶

  • var1: A variable reference object that represents a string to get the length of.
  • var2: A variable reference object that represents an int to be set to the length.

2: Set Length¶

  • var1: A variable reference object that represents a string to set the length of.
  • var2: A variable reference object that represents an int to set the length to.

3: Get Substr¶

  • var1: A variable reference object that represents a string to get a substring from.
  • var2: A variable reference object that represents the index to start reading from.
  • var3: A variable reference object that will be set to the substring. The length of the read substring is the length of this var, or 1 if this is an int.

4: Set Substr¶

  • var1: A variable reference object that represents a string to set the substring to.
  • var2: A variable reference object that represents the index to start writing from.
  • var3: A variable reference object that will be used as the substring. The substring is the length of this var, or 1 if this is an int.

Returns¶

  • None
